channel.title: World-Hunger-Sunday on Sermon Archives
channel.description: Recent content in World-Hunger-Sunday on Sermon Archives

item.title: Love Builds Bridges
item.description: This is an undated, printed and highlighted sermon that does indicate a date in the church calendar, but not a date. My guess is that it’s from the 1990s given it was printed from a computer.

item.title: Which One Represents You?
item.description: Here is a Pentecost sermon that I have two different copies scanned. One copy is highlighted with yellow highlighter, and a copy that is not highlighted. I also used OCR from Google Docs to get a text version of the sermon.

item.title: From Repentance to Hope
item.description: This Lenten sermon is from 1992 and appears to be printed out from a computer, then highlighted in yellow and marked with black ink. The text mentions that it is World Hunger Sunday. The sermon was preached in Seymour, WI.
